description:
Kamba heads to Masako Natsume`s house trying to recover the half of the diary that was taken from Ringo, however Masako says that she needs the diary just as much as he does, and refuses to hand it over.
On the other side of things, Ringo tells Shoma that the dairy was once her sister Momoka`s diary. She believes that because she was born on the day that her sister died, she was born to replace her. Shoma simply tells her that `Ringo is Ringo, and nobody else`.

titles.title: Tu en as enfin pris conscience
Youyaku Kimi wa Kigatsuita no sa
ようやく君は気がついたのさ
